item.title: Is it the end of the road for livestock farming?
item.author: Elliot Dryer-Beers,
item.description: Conversations surrounding human contributions to global warming are naturally fraught with confusion due to the sheer enormity and complexity of the issue, but can also be twisted by those whose proximal goals conflict with the changes necessary to address it. One such point of confusion frequently …

item.title: Lettuce Eat Better
item.author: Elliot Dryer-Beers,
item.description: Now that Veganuary 2019 has come to an end, it’s the perfect time to reflect on the cultural shift veganism and the plant-based message experienced in recent decades. Veganism, it’s fair to say, has recently experienced a leap from the fringe into the spotlight, with many reasons underlying its …
